description: The Internet Calendaring and Scheduling Core Object Specification (iCalendar) is a media type which allows users to store and exchange calendaring and scheduling information such as events, to-dos, journal entries, and free/busy information,[1] and together with its associated standards has been a cornerstone of the standardization and interoperability of digital calendars across different vendors.
label: Internet Calendaring and Scheduling Core Object Specification (iCalendar)

attach.description: The property provides the capability to associate a document object with a calendar component.

attendee.description: The property defines an "Attendee" within a calendar component.
attendee.label: attendee

duration.description: The property specifies a positive duration of time.

exrule.description: This property defines a rule or repeating pattern for an exception to a recurrence set.

freebusy.description: The property defines one or more free or busy time intervals.

geo.description: This property specifies information related to the global position for the activity specified by a calendar component.

trigger.description: This property specifies when an alarm will trigger.

tzurl.description: The TZURL provides a means for a VTIMEZONE component to point to a network location that can be used to retrieve an up-to- date version of itself.

X-.description: This class of property provides a framework for defining non-standard properties.

altrep.description: To specify an alternate text representation for the property value.

cn.description: To specify the common name to be associated with the calendar user specified by the property.

completed.description: This property defines the date and time that a to-do was actually completed.

cutype.description: To specify the type of calendar user specified by the property.

delegatedFrom.description: To specify the calendar users that have delegated their participation to the calendar user specified by the property.

delegatedTo.description: To specify the calendar users to whom the calendar user specified by the property has delegated participation.

dir.description: To specify reference to a directory entry associated with the calendar user specified by the property.

dtend.description: This property specifies the date and time that a calendar component ends.
dtend.label: end

encoding.description: To specify an alternate inline encoding for the property value.

fbtype.description: To specify the free or busy time type.

fmttype.description: To specify the content type of a referenced object.

language.description: To specify the language for text values in a property or property parameter.

member.description: To specify the group or list membership of the calendar user specified by the property.

partstat.description: To specify the participation status for the calendar user specified by the property.

percentComplete.description: This property is used by an assignee or delegatee of a to-do to convey the percent completion of a to-do to the Organizer.

range.description: To specify the effective range of recurrence instances from the instance specified by the recurrence identifier specified by the property.

related.description: To specify the relationship of the alarm trigger with respect to the start or end of the calendar component.

reltype.description: To specify the type of hierarchical relationship associated with the calendar component specified by the property.

role.description: To specify the participation role for the calendar user specified by the property.

rsvp.description: To specify whether there is an expectation of a favor of a reply from the calendar user specified by the property value.

sentBy.description: To specify the calendar user that is acting on behalf of the calendar user specified by the property.

sequence.description: This property defines the revision sequence number of the calendar component within a sequence of revisions.

tzoffsetfrom.description: This property specifies the offset which is in use prior to this time zone observance.

Valarm.description: Provide a grouping of component properties that define an alarm.

Vevent.description: Provide a grouping of component properties that describe an event.
Vevent.label: Event

Vfreebusy.description: Provide a grouping of component properties that describe either a request for free/busy time, describe a response to a request for free/busy time or describe a published set of busy time.

Vjournal.description: Provide a grouping of component properties that describe a journal entry.

Vtimezone.description: Provide a grouping of component properties that defines a time zone.

Vtodo.description: Provide a grouping of calendar properties that describe a to-do.
Vtodo.label: To-do
